answers.answer: Very likely, my cousin had the same at 36weeks she noticed sudden swelling in her face and hands. They booked her in for a c-section the following day- i am not aware of any other procedures in this situation.

question: Hello question. How likely will my doctor induce me if I have preeclampsia? Ill be 37 weeks along this saturday my son is measuring a week ahead. Today going into the doctor they noticed high blood pressure but no protine in my urine so they are collecting samples for 24 hours. Ive had severe rib pain cramping head aches now im getting light headed. Will my doctor enduce me? And how common is it to get a c section with preeclampsia?
title: Preeclampsia
